OOC: I have 2 things to say 1)Yanshosh wait until I finish the ark before 
lecturing me on time. Building a ship is just like building a model it takes 
a lot of time maybe even weeks. Unless you want to get your charaters out 
there and fix your own mess. 2)Also Yanshosh save your lectures I didn't 
need them back then and I don't need them now!

::Everyone still working on the Ark ?1-?5 plus Koj and Inu::

::?3::
?3 Checks his scanners and patrols the area rea dy for battle if they make 
it through the traps alive.
